title: Crash while resizing with 'index out of bounds: the len is 55 but the index mod.rs:796:17'
body:
### Description

I am not entirely sure about the preconditions, but it seems to be related to the font.

- Start `nvim` in the `alacrity` and open some file to edit
- Keep resizing the window multiple times
- crash

Building alacrity with below diff seems fixing the issue:

```diff
diff --git a/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs b/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs
index 8013f6c5..1808f3aa 100644
--- a/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs
+++ b/alacritty_terminal/src/term/mod.rs
@@ -792,7 +792,7 @@ impl<T> Term<T> {
             // Remove wide char and spacer.
             let wide = cursor_cell.flags.contains(Flags::WIDE_CHAR);
             let point = self.grid.cursor.point;
-            if wide && point.column <= self.last_column() {
+            if wide && point.column < self.last_column() {
                 self.grid[point.line][point.column + 1].flags.remove(Flags::WIDE_CHAR_SPACER);
             } else if point.column > 0 {
                 self.grid[point.line][point.column - 1].clear_wide();
```

### System

OS: Linux archlinux
Version: `alacritty --version` output
```
➜  glrnvim git:(cfg_dir) "/home/cc/repo/alacritty/target/debug/alacritty" --version
alacritty 0.10.0-dev (259e7c7a)
```
The same issue happens to `0.8.0` as well.

Linux: X11, awesomeWM

### Logs

Crashes: STDERR, STDOUT
Font/Terminal size: `alacritty -vv`

```
➜  glrnvim git:(cfg_dir) "/home/cc/repo/alacritty/target/debug/alacritty" "--config-file" "/tmp/.tmpagTGPw" -vv

[2021-08-01 23:54:37.066585964] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Estimated DPR: 1.1666666666666667

config file:
```
➜  glrnvim git:(cfg_dir) cat /tmp/.tmpagTGPw
---
font:
  size: 12
  normal:
    family: FiraCode Nerd Font
key_bindings:
  - key: Z
    mods: Control
    action: None%
```

```
